column5: I have an old boat with a 'plate' on the stern that has a number and max hp rating on it.  It is very old, was given to me from a friend years ago, but I now have a 15 hp motor on it.  How do I register it?  I couldn't 'google' up a quick page for it.  Any Help?  Entropy
"Registering an old boat"   got about a million hits with all the answers.
and that one was nfg.  looking for the right answer.
Sorry if you can't help yourself, here's another one: http://www.tc.gc.ca/eng/marinesafety/debs-obs-paperwork-paperwork_boat_licence-3211.htm
Bingo!  Thanks, that will do it.  Now to find the time to look at the page and get my but in gear before we get checked.
